# todo (Resource)

The todo resource allows you to configure a todo/reminder.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "todo" "mine" {
  description = "go shopping"
  completed = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `completed` (Boolean)
- `description` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
